snippet.title: Discolored 2 - Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Discolored 2 will release on January 8th 2025 on Steam! 

The game will also be playable on the Steam Deck and is currently being ported to the Nintendo Switch, but no firm date on when that will come out. ❤️‍💚💙

If you haven't already wishlisted the game please consider doing do. The Steam algorithm favors games with a high wishlist count. 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1859720/Discolored_2/

Happy holidays to you and yours! See you in January! 🎄 🥂 

Jason
